org.gvsig.symbology.fmap.mapcontext.rendering.symbol.style

Class SimpleLabelStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.symbology.fmap.mapcontext.rendering.symbol.style.AbstractStyle
      • org.gvsig.symbology.fmap.mapcontext.rendering.symbol.style.SimpleLabelStyle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, ILabelStyle, IStyle, Persistent

    public class SimpleLabelStyle
extends AbstractStyle
implements ILabelStyle
    Implements a style for the creation of simple labels.

      • drawInsideRectangle

        public void drawInsideRectangle(Graphics2D g,
                       Rectangle r)
                         throws SymbolDrawingException
        Description copied from interface: IStyle
        Useful to render the symbol inside the TOC, or inside little rectangles. For example, think about rendering a Label with size in meters => You will need to specify a size in pixels. Of course. You may also preffer to render a prepared image, etc.
        Specified by:

      • getMarkerPoint

        public Point2D getMarkerPoint()
        Description copied from interface: ILabelStyle
        Returns the position of the point labeled by this label in percent units relative to the label bounds. It determines the offset to be applied to the label to be placed and allows the user to use custom styles.
        Specified by:
        getMarkerPoint in interface ILabelStyle
